com.codekutter.zconfig.pipelines

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codekutter.zconfig.pipelines.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    A Context handle that can be passed around within an execution context. Note: Instance is not thread safe, hence should not be shared.
